titleStmt.title: A slaunderous libell (cast abroad) vnto an epitaph set forth vpon the death of D.E. Boner, with a reply to the same lying libell, by T. Broo
titleStmt.author: Broke, Thomas, fl. 1570.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Iohn Daye, dwellyng ouer Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: T. Broo. = Thomas Broke; signed at end T. Brooke the younger.
Reproduction of original in the Pembroke College, Oxford, England.
